actions.manager

Class ActionsManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • actions.manager.ActionsManager

  • public class ActionsManager
extends java.lang.Object
    Class that has static functions for updating Application's AbstractActions, that is their states, names and descriptions.
    Author:
    Milan Radeta, Borko ArsoviÄ‡, Ivan Divljak
    See Also:
    AbstractAction, Application

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static void updateActionLanguage(java.util.Locale locale)
      Updates the names and descriptions of all AbstractActions used by Applications according to the set Locale.
      static void updateRecordActions()
      Updates the states of AbstractActions that manipulate records.
      static void updateTabActions()
      Updates the states of AbstractActions that affect MainFrame's TabbedPane.
      static void updateTreeActions()
      Updates the states AbstractActions that affect MainFrame's Tree or are used via it.
